bibl.title: Geophysics Applied to the Investigation of Graeco-Roman Coastal Towns West of Alexandria: The Case of Marina el-Alamein.
bibl.note: Introductory remarks. - Geological setting. - The site of Marina el-Alamein. - Geophysical methods and the urban and sepulchral architecture. - Ground penetrating radar survey. - Measurements and data processing. - Discussion of GPR results. - Magnetic survey. - Measurements and data processing. - Discussion of results. - Conclusion. - Archaeological verification of geophysical results.

bibl.title: Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday.

bibl.seg: Tomasz Herbich, Harald von der Osten-Woldenburg & Iwona Zych, Geophysics Applied to the Investigation of Graeco-Roman Coastal Towns West of Alexandria: The Case of Marina el-Alamein.
Henryk Meyza & Iwona Zych (edd.), Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 209-213, 11 figg. n./bl. et coul., 2 pll.

Introductory remarks. - Geological setting. - The site of Marina el-Alamein. - Geophysical methods and the urban and sepulchral architecture. - Ground penetrating radar survey. - Measurements and data processing. - Discussion of GPR results. - Magnetic survey. - Measurements and data processing. - Discussion of results. - Conclusion. - Archaeological verification of geophysical results.
